title: 'The Shining'  Actor Shelley Duvall Dies At 75
content: Shelley Duvall, the versatile actor known for her role in "The Shining" and collaboration with director Robert Altman, died Thursday aged 75.
summary: Shelley Duvall, the versatile actor known for her role in "The Shining" and collaboration with director Robert Altman, died Thursday aged 75.

title: "Difficult Situation": Over 70 Whales Found Stranded On Scotland Island
content: Scores of whales washed ashore in a "mass stranding" in Scotland's Orkney archipelago on Thursday, a British marine life rescue charity said.
summary: Scores of whales washed ashore in a "mass stranding" in Scotland's Orkney archipelago on Thursday, a British marine life rescue charity said.

title: Hawaii Airport Evacuated After Grenades Discovered In Man's Baggage
content: Akito Fukushima, of Kanazawa, Japan, was taken into custody on a charge of first-degree terroristic threats.

title: Cathay Pacific Passenger Hospitalised After Hand Baggage Falls On Her Head
content: She received medical assistance at the airport before being transferred to a local hospital for further treatment.

title: AI Just Created A Glowing Protein Molecule Similar To One In Jellyfish

title: Actions Of Imran Khan Similar To "Terrorist": Court On May 9 Violence Case
content: An anti-terrorism court in Pakistan on Thursday said the actions of jailed former prime minister Imran Khan were similar to that of a "terrorist" in a case linked to the May 9 violence.
summary: An anti-terrorism court in Pakistan on Thursday said the actions of jailed former prime minister Imran Khan were similar to that of a "terrorist" in a case linked to the May 9 violence.

title: Human Remains Found In Suitcases At UK Bridge, Manhunt Launched: Cops
content: British police have launched a manhunt after two suitcases which are believed to contain human remains were found at the Clifton Suspension Bridge in Bristol, south west England.
summary: British police have launched a manhunt after two suitcases which are believed to contain human remains were found at the Clifton Suspension Bridge in Bristol, south west England.

title: In Shocking Video, Delta And American Eagle Planes Nearly Collide Mid-Air
content: A dash camera from a North Syracuse Police Department patrol car captured the near in-air collision late morning on Monday, July 8.
summary: A dash camera from a North Syracuse Police Department patrol car captured the near in-air collision late morning on Monday, July 8.

title: Exoplanet Near Earth May Be First Known Ocean World, Finds Webb Telescope
content: A planet relatively close to Earth could be the first ever detected with a potentially life-sustaining liquid ocean outside our Solar System, according to scientists using the James Webb space telescope.
summary: A planet relatively close to Earth could be the first ever detected with a potentially life-sustaining liquid ocean outside our Solar System, according to scientists using the James Webb space telescope.

title: Germany To Phase Out Chinese Telecom Giants From 5G Networks
content: Germany said Thursday it will phase out the use of components from Chinese telecom giants Huawei and ZTE in its 5G networks in the coming years due to national security concerns.
summary: Germany said Thursday it will phase out the use of components from Chinese telecom giants Huawei and ZTE in its 5G networks in the coming years due to national security concerns.

title: Watch: Fliers Slide Down Plane After Its Landing Gear Catches Fire In Pak
content: Saudi Airlines flight from Riyadh caught fire upon landing at Pakistan's Peshawar airport on Thursday, prompting a swift evacuation of all 276 passengers and 21 crew members to safety.
summary: Saudi Airlines flight from Riyadh caught fire upon landing at Pakistan's Peshawar airport on Thursday, prompting a swift evacuation of all 276 passengers and 21 crew members to safety.

title: Opinion: Russia Visit: An Emphatic Foreign Policy Statement From Modi 3.0
content: From inviting all neighbouring countries except China and Pakistan to his swearing-in ceremony, to strategic engagements at the G-7 summit in Italy, and now visits to Russia and Austria, Modi is making significant statements on the global stage.
summary: From inviting all neighbouring countries except China and Pakistan to his swearing-in ceremony, to strategic engagements at the G-7 summit in Italy, and now visits to Russia and Austria, Modi is making significant statements on the global stage.

title: Fire Breaks Out At France's Rouen Cathedral Amid Restoration
content: A fire broke out Thursday in the spire of the cathedral in northern French city Rouen, its mayor said, sharing a photo of a column of smoke rising from the Gothic landmark.
summary: A fire broke out Thursday in the spire of the cathedral in northern French city Rouen, its mayor said, sharing a photo of a column of smoke rising from the Gothic landmark.

title: Senior Citizens To Outnumber Those Below 18 By 2080 Globally: UN Report
content: The UN World Population Prospects report said the world's population will peak in the mid-2080s, growing over the next 60 years from 8.2 billion people now to 10.3 billion in the mid-2080s, and will return to 10.2 billion by the end of the century.
summary: The UN World Population Prospects report said the world's population will peak in the mid-2080s, growing over the next 60 years from 8.2 billion people now to 10.3 billion in the mid-2080s, and will return to 10.2 billion by the end of the century.

title: UK's Conservative Party MP Bob Blackman Takes Oath On Bible, Bhagavad Gita
content: Conservative MP Bob Blackman has taken the oath of office, swearing allegiance to King Charles on both the Bible and the Bhagavad Gita. Mr Blackman took the oath on the Gita in 2019 as well.
summary: Conservative MP Bob Blackman has taken the oath of office, swearing allegiance to King Charles on both the Bible and the Bhagavad Gita. Mr Blackman took the oath on the Gita in 2019 as well.

title: Video: Newly Elected UK PM Takes Break From NATO Meeting To Watch Euro Game
content: UK PM Keir Starmer joined in the ongoing UEFA European Football Championship (EURO) hype as he 'popped out' from a NATO meeting to catch a quick glimpse of the intense semi-final game between England and Netherlands.
summary: UK PM Keir Starmer joined in the ongoing UEFA European Football Championship (EURO) hype as he 'popped out' from a NATO meeting to catch a quick glimpse of the intense semi-final game between England and Netherlands.

title: Watch: Indian-Origin UK MP Shivani Raja Takes Oath On Bhagavad Gita
content: Indian-origin Shivani Raja has become the first Conservative MP to win the Leicester East seat in 37 years.
summary: Indian-origin Shivani Raja has become the first Conservative MP to win the Leicester East seat in 37 years.

title: Romanians Slam Louis Vuitton For "Stealing" Their Traditional Blouse
content: Villagers in Vaideeni at the foot of Romania's Carpathian mountains are fuming at French luxury brand Louis Vuitton for "stealing" the design of their traditional blouse.
summary: Villagers in Vaideeni at the foot of Romania's Carpathian mountains are fuming at French luxury brand Louis Vuitton for "stealing" the design of their traditional blouse.

title: Cooking Oil Transported In Fuel Containers? Huge Uproar In China
content: Revelations that cooking oil has been transported in containers also used to carry fuel have sparked outrage in China, the latest scandal in a country where fears about food safety are widespread.
summary: Revelations that cooking oil has been transported in containers also used to carry fuel have sparked outrage in China, the latest scandal in a country where fears about food safety are widespread.

title: Dark Side Of Manifesting And Believing Our Thoughts Have Too Much Power
content: Have you tried manifesting? Its hard to escape on social media  the idea that you can will what you desire into reality through the power of belief. This could be financial success, romantic love or sporting glory.
summary: Have you tried manifesting? Its hard to escape on social media  the idea that you can will what you desire into reality through the power of belief. This could be financial success, romantic love or sporting glory.
